title: Apple releases macOS 12.4 beta 4 for developers
content:
Arriving a week after the third macOS 12.4 beta for developers and public testers – including the first webcam fix for Apple’s Studio Display – Apple has seeded macOS 12.4 beta 4 today to developers.

more…

The post Apple releases macOS 12.4 beta 4 for developers appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Arriving a week after the third macOS 12.4 beta for developers and public testers – including the first webcam fix for Apple’s Studio Display – Apple has seeded macOS 12.4 beta 4 today to developers. macOS 12.4 beta 4 is now available via OTA for developers already enrolled in the beta as well as being available […]
